definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="224" y="191"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:joint</field><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">SPIT</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.3</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
